Name: Calibrate Distributor
Description: Press the button below the meter in time to that the spinning black node connects with the device

Name: Clean Toilet
Description: Move the plunger up and down until the pressure reaches the maximum

Name: Decontaminate
Description: Wait until the percentage has reached 0%

Name: Develop Photos
Description: Drag the three photos and place them in the water, using the green dot as a guide. After the countdown ends, drag each of the three photos out of the water

Name: Divert Power
Location: (1) Electrical\n(2) Armory, Cockpit, Engine Room, Meeting Room, Showers
Description: (1) Pull up the glowing lever on the device\n(2) Flip the switch in the center of the panel

Name: Dress Mannequin
Description: Select the hat, eyewear, and clothing article seen in the picture above

Name: Empty Garbage
Location: (1) Kitchen, Main Hall, Medical\n(2) Meeting Room
Description: (1) Pull the garbage bag out of the bin\n(2) Pull and hold the lever

Name: Enter ID Code
Description: Take the ID out of the wallet and type the ID code into the screen

Name: Fix Shower
Description: Hold the showerhead to use the mallet to re-align the showerhead

Name: Fix Wiring
Location: Cargo Bay, Cells, Engine Room, Hallway, Lounge, Main Hall, Meeting Room
Description: (1-3) Connect wires of the same color

Name: Fuel Engines
Description: (1, 3) Fill the gas container by pressing and holding the button\n(2, 4) Fill the gas tank by pressing and holding the button

Name: Make Burger
Description: Memorize the composition of the burger, as shown on the recipe, then place the ingredients in the correct order

Name: Pick Up Towels
Description: (1) Pick up each towel\n(2) Put each towel in the basket

Name: Polish Ruby
Description: Use the cloth to clear the smudges on the ruby

Name: Put Away Pistols
Description: Drag the four pistols and place them in the outlines

Name: Put Away Rifles
Description: Drag the two rifles and place them in the outlines

Name: Reset Breakers
Description: (1-7) Pull the lever down in order, based on the number of the breaker

Name: Rewind Tapes
Description: Press the rewind, pause, play, and fast-forward buttons until the time of the recorder matches the time on the note

Name: Sort Records
Description: (1-4) Click on the file then place the file in the appropriate area

Name: Stabilitze Steering
Description: Move the cursor to the center

Name: Start Fans
Description: (1) Click 'Reveal Code' and remember the code\n(2) Click 'Enter Code' and enter the code

Name: Unlock Safe
Description: Use the paper to turn the dial to the correct numbers and in the correct direction, then rotate the wheel

Name: Upload Data
Location: (1) Armory, Brig, Cargo Bay, Cockpit, Gap Room, Records, Vault\n(2) Security (Outside), Viewing Deck (Outside)
Description: (1) Press the 'Download' button\n(2) Move the device until the connection reads PERFECT Then wait for the data to upload
